Wheat.control: 🌿 Spray neem oil extract. 🐞 Encourage ladybird beetles. 💧 Avoid waterlogging. 💊 If severe, apply imidacloprid or chlorpyrifos.

Rice.control: 🌱 Maintain proper spacing. 🐦 Encourage ducks/birds. 🌿 Use neem-based pesticides. 💊 If heavy infestation, spray triazophos or cartap hydrochloride.

Cotton.control: 🪤 Use pheromone traps. 🌿 Spray Bt formulation. 🐞 Release Trichogramma. 💊 If severe, spray spinosad or thiamethoxam.

Maize.control: 🌱 Sowing in clusters reduces attack. 🌿 Spray neem extracts. 🪤 Use pheromone traps. 💊 Apply emamectin benzoate for severe infestations.

Paddy.control: 💧 Keep fields flooded properly. 🐦 Encourage birds/fish. 🌿 Spray neem oil. 💊 Apply chlorantraniliprole or fipronil if needed.

Vegetables.control: 🌿 Neem seed kernel extract. 🐞 Encourage lacewings. 🪤 Use sticky traps. 💊 Spray emamectin benzoate or spinosad for severe cases.
